summary: Tech encompasses innovative approaches and digital advancements that shape our interconnected world. It explores how technology influences various fields, from ecosystem concepts to organizational structures. This theme delves into the evolution of ideas and their application in modern, decentralized systems. It challenges traditional boundaries and encourages interdisciplinary solutions for complex networks, emphasizing the role of technology in shaping future paradigms across different domains.
excerpt: The article explores the evolution of 'ecosystem' from biology to metaphor, introducing 'ecosystem architecture' as a new approach to designing modern, decentralized organizations that transcend traditional boundaries.
